text: Terry's Texas Rangers Monument is an outdoor memorial commemorating Terry's Texas Rangers who fought during the American Civil War, installed on the Texas State Capitol grounds in Austin, Texas, United States. The monument was designed by Pompeo Coppini and erected in 1907. It features a bronze ranger on a horse. ==See also== * 1907 in art * List of Confederate monuments and memorials ==References== ==External links== * Category:1907 establishments in Texas Category:1907 sculptures Category:Bronze sculptures in Texas Category:Confederate States of America monuments and memorials in Texas Category:Equestrian statues in Texas Category:Monuments and memorials in Texas Category:Outdoor sculptures in Austin, Texas Category:Sculptures of men in Texas
title: Terry's Texas Rangers Monument
